channel.title: About on Selim Kuzucu

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am a final year undergraduate student at Middle East Technical University. I am interested in computer vision with a further focus on robustness and uncertainty quantification. Education Middle East Technical University Bachelor of Science - Computer Engineering High Honor Student with GPA: 3.69/4.00. Ranking 12 out of 183 students. Experience University of Cambridge, Affective Intelligence and Robotics Lab Undergraduate Researcher Facial activation unit recognition, GNNs, fairness, uncertainty quantification
